EmailTemplate.description: Your menu update request could not be processed
EmailTemplate.name: FP Menu Change - Could not be processed - Deflection
EmailTemplate.subject: Your menu update request could not be processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
Thank you for your submission. Unfortunately we cannot process your request. Please head on over to Menu Management in Restaurant Portal to update your menu with just a few clicks. Your request will be reviewed within 48 working hours by our Quality Control team.
Click https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/login to log in to Menu Management or if you forgot your password
Click https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support_malaysia to request for your login details
Cheers, Your foodpanda team
